page.title: 10EDUCATION IN EVERCREECH
page.content:
EVERCREECH PRIMARY SCHOOL
Evercreech School has got 180 children.There are 5 classrooms.There is a swimming pool.It has got a front play ground and a back play ground.It's got a hall,field and a nature area.There are two computers and two televisions. There is a new headmaster Mr.Paget. And the old headmaster was called Mr.Paradise. He retired last year after 22 years at the school.
PRE-SCHOOL EDUCATION There is a Playschool which is held at the village hall.A Nursery School uses the Methodist Church.The children who go to these are from three years old until they go to School.Each caters for up to twenty children at a time.
